description:
Swaps the user's Defense and Sp. Defense stats with those of another Pok√©mon for a short time when it hits. Swapping with an enemy deals damage over time and decreases their movement speed while increasing the user's movement speed for a short time. Swapping with an ally increases the movement speed of that ally and the user for a short time.

Also continually restores the HP of the user and the ally while this move is in effect.
